head.title: Combined Practice Set For West Point

identified-content.classifier: Top/News/Sports/Pro Football/National Football League/New York Giants
Top/News/Sports/Pro Football/National Football League/New York Jets

hedline.hl1: Combined Practice Set For West Point

abstract.p: New York Giants will have rare combined practice with New York Jets during teams' summer training at neutral site, West Point, on Aug 8 (S)

block.p: The Giants will have a rare combined practice with the Jets during the teams' summer training at a neutral site -- West Point -- on Aug. 8. That would put the workout just about midway between the Giants' camp in Albany and the Jets' complex in Hempstead, N.Y.

The Giants also announced yesterday that they would combine a practice with the New England Patriots on July 27 at the University of Massachusetts, two days before the Giants hold their intrasquad scrimmage.

The Giants will have a rare combined practice with the Jets during the teams' summer training at a neutral site -- West Point -- on Aug. 8. That would put the workout just about midway between the Giants' camp in Albany and the Jets' complex in Hempstead, N.Y.

The Giants also announced yesterday that they would combine a practice with the New England Patriots on July 27 at the University of Massachusetts, two days before the Giants hold their intrasquad scrimmage.
The Giants will open summer camp at the University at Albany on July 21. The first practice will start the next day and all sessions will be free to the public except for the scrimmage.
